synopsis.text: Himeno Toyokawa moves with her father to the city of Tajimi, where her late mother grew up and became a legendary potter. At her mother's alma mater, Himeno's classmate Mika invites her to join the school's pottery club. There, Himeno learns of her mother's renown talent and reputation, pulling her into the captivating world of pottery. In the club's next contest, Himeno feels pressure to create something remarkable that honors her mother's legacy. With encouragement from friends, she pushes past self-doubt and creative obstacles to produce an impressive piece. Its positive reception drives her ambition further. Himeno's father suggests her next project become the centerpiece display at his caf√©. The stakes heighten as she seeks the perfect inspiration that captures the essence of pottery. Through new experiences that reconnect her to pottery's foundations, Himeno and her friends rediscover their passion's core.
